Open the "Retro Music Player" application, displaying the "Songs" screen with the message "You have no songs".
Click the "Playlists" icon to view saved playlists.
Click the three dots icon in the upper right corner to open the options menu.
Click "New playlist" to create a new playlist.
Enter "Workout" as the playlist name.
Click "Create" to save the new playlist named "Workout".
Click on the "Workout" playlist to view its contents.
